name: cables-daplaya-build
description: a standalone player for cables.gl-patches using the nwjs framework
author: undefined development <hi@undev.de>

scripts.start: cd src/ && npm install && cd .. && nwbuild --version $npm_package_devDependencies_nw -r src/
scripts.build: cd src && npm install && cd .. && nwbuild --version $npm_package_devDependencies_nw --platforms win64,linux64,osx64 --flavor normal --cacheDir build/cache/ --buildDir build/dist/ src/
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf src/node_modules/
scripts.dist: BASEDIR=`pwd`; cd build/dist/cables-daplaya/; for i in `find . -maxdepth 1 ! -path . -type d`; do cd $i; zip -r ../../daplaya-`basename $i`.zip *; cd ..; done; cd $BASEDIR
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run dist && gh-release --assets build/dist/daplaya-linux64.zip,build/dist/daplaya-osx64.zip,build/dist/daplaya-win64.zip
